member.name: M:RemoteVar.Corev2.Controllers.VariablesController.App(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the variable list for the application
member.returns: The JSON for the specified application
member.response: Returns the JSON for the application variables
No application with specified ID was found
member.param: test for development mode and rel for release mode
Specifies the conversion of variable values to their specific types
